title: [Mistydeep, Upper Reaches]
description: The water here is a pleasant dichotomy of quiet stillness and swirling agitation as a row of rocks dams the majority of the river's flow.  A few surging rivulets manage to break free, streaming in to fill this kidney-shaped depression.  A stone shelf beneath the rocky barrier allows those who perch there to experience leisurely water-massages.
paths: Obvious paths: northeast, east, southeast, down
room.location: the northern reaches of the Mistydeep River
